ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Dinosaur
ygData.msgSnippet: Exactly! I think they should be like portable banks. Except they wouldn t do coin conversion. I also kinda wish the horses and stuff could be like the ones in
ygData.messageBody:
Exactly! I think they should be like portable banks. Except they wouldn't do
coin conversion.
I also kinda wish the horses and stuff could be like the ones in D&D where
there are different kinds. Ones to carry stuff, ones for riding, or ones for
fighting. And riding could be a skill.
I really wish they'd lower horse prices... I don't want one for prestige. I
want one that is useful. For the prices horses cost they should give you
+100 to your charisma.
luv,
-Su

> Hey, that's pretty cool! Give a little, get a little, I guess, LOL. Oh,
and
> I agree... horses and dinosaurs should definitely have bags equiped with
> them, or at least there should be the option to buy some that fit on
them...
> and they should reduce weight 100%, seeing as you are not the one carrying
> them, LOL.
>
> -= Mippon - Level 40 Druid Halfling =-
>
